column1: Uchi////Have I ever spent more on sushi at another restaurant than at uchi? No. However
column2: have I ever eaten better sushi than at at uchi? Also no. Even one year after visiting this amazing restaurant
column3: I can remember the tastes and textures so vividly
column4: and the restaurant experience will linger in my mind forever. Not your casual neighborhood sushi place
column6: your tastebuds will be elevated to new heights. I especially appreciate all the vegetarian options offered as well
column7: and I hope to have the opportunity to revisit the spectacular omokase again and again. Come here with an open mind and an empty stomach.
